bug.short_desc: SASL man page should reference web documentation

long_desc.thetext:
The sasl(3) man page has this to say about administration:
For information on setting up/configuring the SASL library see the System Administrators Guide in the doc/ directory of the SASL distribution.
The problem is that 99% of your users have never downloaded the SASL source tarball, nor do they have any clue where to find it. The result is a bunch of confused admins complaining to people like me. :-)
Please add a copy of the docs to your website and provide that URL in the man page. To ensure that it stays current, just run a nightly cron job that does a "cvs update" on the doc directory. Doing that is near zero maintenance, and would make life much easier for admins.
Thanks.
